extensions.name: Web Compiler
extensions.description: The easiest and most powerful way to compile LESS, Scss and CoffeeScript files directly within Visual Studio or through MSBuild.

extensions.name: Yaml Editor
extensions.description: Provides a complete YAML editing experience in Visual Studio, including: - Syntax highlightning - Syntax error detection - Comment / uncomment selection - Format document

extensions.name: Extensibility Tools
extensions.description: An extension for making it easier to write Visual Studio extensions

extensions.name: Open Command Line
extensions.description: Opens a command line at the root of the project. Support for all consoles such as CMD, PowerShell, Bash etc. Provides syntax highlighting, Intellisense and execution of .cmd and .bat files.

extensions.name: Broccoli Task Runner
extensions.description: Adds support for Broccoli brocfile.js files as well as Ember-CLI's ember-cli-build.js build scripts based on Broccoli.

extensions.name: EditorConfig
extensions.description: Loads editor options such as indentation sizes from standard, cross-platform .editorconfig files.
